name: Leonid Kierchiev
bio: C / C++ | Python | JS / React / Node.JS | Git | Entity Framework / Architecture patterns | AWS  Main interests: Applied Mathematics | Corporate Accounting | Equities and Derivatives

milestones.title: First interactions with PC
milestones.description: Unenumerated hours of playing games on family computer.

milestones.title: Disassembling PC
milestones.description: At age of 7 put my hands inside PC: assembly, simple upgrade, putting together local networks for gaming purposes.

milestones.title: First line of code!
milestones.description: At age 10 got book about MS Visual C++, started coding simple desktop programs.

milestones.title: Winning national engineering competitions
milestones.description: Getting 1st place in Engeneering section in national Intel-Techno and Intel-Eco competitions.

milestones.title: Accepted to the best technical university in country.
milestones.description: I send paperwork only into one dream University and got accepted.

milestones.title: Build many projects for myself and for graduate students.
milestones.description: One of most memorable was project about Balancing Machine for high speed rotors. Best part was compressing data with Fast Fourier Transformation to transfer it from microcontroller to computer. You can check couple photoes on my LinkedIn

milestones.title: Data Analytic / Researcher
milestones.description: Started work at proprietary trading desk as Data Analyst / Researcher, developing simple applications for traders and for risk department. Tech stack: VS C++, Python, WEB APIs, JavaScript

milestones.title: Software Engineer
milestones.description: Started at new position as software engineer, leading small team on building analytical tools and applicactions for Real Estate investment company. Gathering and parsing complex data sets. Tech stack: Python, JavaScript, AWS .
